channel.title: CVE Feed for wp-buy -- WooCommerce Conditional Marketing Mailer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wp-buy -- WooCommerce Conditional Marketing Mailer

item.title: CVE-2021-24190|2024-08-03T19:21:18.665Z -- wp-buy -- woocommerce%20conditional%20marketing%20mailer
item.description: Low privileged users can use the AJAX action 'cp_plugins_do_button_job_later_callback' in the WooCommerce Conditional Marketing Mailer WordPress plugin before 1.5.2, to install any plugin (including a specific version) from the WordPress repository, as well as activate arbitrary plugin from then blog, which helps attackers install vulnerable plugins and could lead to more critical vulnerabilities like RCE.
